column4: Ok, when I click on the amarok icon, it does the bouncy symbol thing, but doesn't load. If I load it in the terminal as user it says "Updating database" thing and doesn't load. If I load it in the terminal as root, it loads fine.
ok, this thing is telling me to make my path to /usr/local/arm-elf/bin so how do I do that?
if you 'echo $PATH' youll see the present path id gedit ~/.bashrc  and include the whole path with the new dir too
